snippet: Antonio Brown is in the driver's seat in his car bet with Brandon Marshall, so he's looking for the Jets receiver to turn over the keys....
lead_paragraph: Antonio Brown is in the driver's seat in his car bet with Brandon Marshall, so he's looking for the Jets receiver to turn over the keys.

headline.main: Steelers' Brown Asks Jets' Marshall to Pay Up on Car Bet
headline.print_headline: Steelers' Brown Asks Jets' Marshall to Pay Up on Car Bet
